oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bovine Field Restraint: Physical and Chemical Techniques for Balanced Restraint
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miesner, Matt D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: physical restraint
cattle
multimodal chemical restraint
cooperation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Restraint of cattle is a vital portion of practice. Knowing and applying methods of basic physical restraint is a necessity. By combining physical restraint methods with multimodal chemical restraint, better patient cooperation and analgesia enhance results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 22-25
